column1: Vimodrone (Lombard: Vimodron [ʋimuˈdrũː]; historically Modrone or  Vico Modrone) is a comune (municipality) in the Metropolitan City of Milan in the Italian region of Lombardy. It is located about 14 kilometres (9 mi) northeast of Milan.
Vimodrone borders the following municipalities: Cologno Monzese
The area has historical associations with the Visconti di Modrone family.
